buginformation.summary: csv format null string should not escaped
buginformation.description: hello use case generating mysql dump files text format for more details check this http dev mysql com doc refman select into html issue the value null represented also default the escape char the csvprinter printandescape method will convert this value into suggest modify the csvprinter order not escape the nullstring value should written can create pull request you want consider minor issue because can mitigated making sure that the escape character not part the nullstring however case means that the load commands should modified accordingly
